summary: Create a website for Trustline Financial Services (focused on credit card sales/work).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-section marketing website for “Trustline Financial Services” focused on credit card sales/work, including a Home page with: hero (company name + short tagline), Services section, How It Works section, About section, and a clear call-to-action to contact the company.

Add a top navigation bar and footer with working anchor links (or routes) to the major sections/pages, and include standard footer items: company name, brief disclaimer text, and social placeholders (non-functional).
Implement a Contact page/section with a form (name, email, phone optional, message) that validates inputs on the client and shows success/error states after submission.
Add a simple admin page in the frontend that displays stored contact submissions by calling the backend list method (read-only view).

Establish a coherent visual theme for a financial-services website (distinct typography, spacing, and a consistent color palette) and apply it consistently across all pages/sections (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).
Add basic on-page SEO and accessibility defaults: descriptive page title, meta description, semantic headings (H1/H2), accessible form labels, and reasonable color contrast.
Render generated image assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (logo and hero image) without routing images through the backend.
Add a new “Job Requirements” section to the Trustline Financial Services homepage with professional, website-ready copy describing the requirements for a Credit Card Sales role.
Update site navigation to include an anchor link to the new Job Requirements section from the top navbar and footer quick links.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for Trustline Financial Services

Create backend support to store contact form submissions in the single Motoko actor, and expose query methods for an admin-like view that lists submissions (no external auth required for this initial build).
Add a Job Requirements/Job Description section to the website for the credit card sales role (professional copy suitable for the site).
